website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality tent that maximizes light efficiency and gives you plenty of room to work inside.
pros: Reflective, tear-proof Mylar interior and floor tray
Double-stitched seams and heavy-duty zippers prevent light leakage
Strong metal poles support heavy-duty tent fabric
Ample vents and ports to maximize growth
cons: So well sealed that heat buildup may be a concern

customer_reviews.title: Gambled on a bargain and lost
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I figured my odds of getting a decent product were fairly good. Nope. Seam longer than 1" completely missed for a giant light leak. Otherwise looks good and went together well. I'll patch the hole and get on with life.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Roth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have this and the 2x4x5 and they are great quality, Look into how to run your venting and filter effectively for heat. You will want to make sure to get rid of extra heat. They are very air tight even with the flaps and vents. They have negative air so the air will rush in A good quality, you want fresh air to go in to help your plants, I like apollo products and have the light systems as well, Just keep an eye on heat build up and enjoy indoor grow!
customer_reviews.author: NotJustMum

customer_reviews.title: Great size, height
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great size, height, and vent/window placement. Side windows give you full access. Cons: Be careful when putting it up. Mine ripped very easily at a zipper seam. Also, light leaks out on all edges in some of the thread holes, as well as a spot bottom corner of both windows.
customer_reviews.author: Snydarb

customer_reviews.title: it's not 36x36, it's at least one inch smaller. not thrilled with being misled.
customer_reviews.text: Its advertised as 36x36 yet it measures out to be about 35x35. I've had it for about 6 months now, everything is holding up fine. If the little flaps that block light for this zipper aren't sitting right then light will come through when the zippers meet. The removable vent covers leak light at the seams, but it's not really an issue and isn't hard to fix yourself. Although it's not difficult to put it together, it is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: TheOneWhoKnocks

customer_reviews.title: This Is The Real Deal For A Grow Tent 💯
customer_reviews.text: Got my Apollo Horticulture Grow Tent right on time, discreet & all parts came in perfect with nothing ripped or teared. Easy directions to set up perfect size as described & material feels thick just the way I wanted it to be. Zippers are perfect and heavy duty seems like the ones to last. Does have a new plastic smell but that's no biggie that smell goes away in a quicks that just lets you know it's all new 👍🏽.. If I were to get a bigger tent I would go for a Apollo Horticulture brand again no doubt
customer_reviews.author: Mark$

customer_reviews.title: VERY high quality! I found a company I'll stick with.
customer_reviews.text: VERY high quality! No light leakage. I had heard it's a bit difficult to assemble so I had a person to help, and it was up and together in less than 15 minutes. They have done a wonderful job sizing this tent to fit the frame. Zippers are high quality. If I had paid double for this tent I'd still be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Well built ,thick material and zippers that seem to work nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality tent. Thicker fabric than I expected. Plenty of port holes to choose from for ventilation, fan, power wires for fans and whatnot. Very reflective to assist grow. Zippers seem sturdy so far. Put it up in about 30 minutes in a very small area. I will eventually by another . The only downside I found is the two bars on top. They just sit there and move easily. Easy fix is just using 4 zip ties to anchor in place. Simple to put together. No light leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Arel

customer_reviews.title: good quality, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, I did it alone in about 10 minutes. The outer lining is heavy and insulates well. Very reflective inside. The top crossbars could be a bit tighter but that's not a huge issue be wise a little duct tape in the crook adds a little extra grip. Will be buying a few more if my winter garden works out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great little tent for the price. Threw a 315cmh in there and knocked out a nice run. Worth the buy if you've only got a little bit of room to grow in.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent all around
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grow tent but I've had amazing results with it. I've broken it down and set it back up four times and completed three grows in it. Light leak is very minimal if not completely absent. Materials are excellent. Nice sturdy zippers and metal hanging rods. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping from Low_Baller... Apollo products are great quality for the money have many of their products and have always been satisfied... this text came in perfect condition and setup perfectly.! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KSK

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great for.small spaces. I grew peppers and carrots in this quite well. I think it could benefit from screens over some of the vents. I get stink bugs crawling in somehow. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was missing the frame.
customer_reviews.text: The tent looked great and sturdy, but wth, it was missing the frame!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy! Durable and not cheaply made (although made ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very apprehensive about this tent and after careful research, I decided why not. Fantastic buy! Durable and not cheaply made (although made in China ). Update: mom loved this. She's in an a place where there's nowhere to grow so I tried to get her set up..this was perfect! ! She's fed me vegetables all summer:)))
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quailty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased saturday morning and received it by 3 pm tuesday, and the package look perfect - not abused in shipping. Assemble and had all my lights, shelves, fans and plants in and ready to go in about 45 min. Quality is amazing, received as a bday gift from my gf, and when she saw it she thought it should have been much more expensive for the quality. Yes there are tiny pin holes around the stitching of the zipper, but nothing I wouldn't expect. Only down small side for me is that without vent ducting yet, the tent does hold a good amount of heat, but I guess that means it's well made and seals well
customer_reviews.author: Erin R

customer_reviews.title: apollo 36x63x72
customer_reviews.text: awesome tent very little light leakage easy setup will buy more highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: kayakpaul

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issue's.
customer_reviews.text: Zippers not that great. There's some black thread material coming off near zipper causing it to get caught I cut off excess loose thread so it don't get caught in zipper and I pull on the zipper a little when using it and I find that makes it go a little smoother.
customer_reviews.author: pacman

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly as i hoped, sturdy, no light leaks
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated, 5 stars cause it's awesome, but I have no idea what I'm doing so I can't judge the tent. Fits perfectly as i hoped, sturdy, no light leaks, Zipper is tough quality. (I literally have no idea what i'm doing, bought 800w LED, nutrients and burned my plants, not the tents fault, lol!)
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cruz

customer_reviews.title: My mother was super satisfied with this gift as it has been a ...
customer_reviews.text: Roomy with lots of ventilation openings! My mother was super satisfied with this gift as it has been a great foundation for her new growing hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size was perfect, however 69/70 inches NOT 72
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent. Size was bough for specific location and fit perfectly. Hanging 2 led lights and a fan , no bends in support rails. I wish i had the window though. Changed cuz I just measured and it's only 69/70 inches tops, mine anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Deeoggee

customer_reviews.title: Almost a winner
customer_reviews.text: It's the zipper system I'm not satisfied with. It's a continuous struggle to get the zippers to move smoothly. I feel like I'm going to break a zipper every time I have to zip it up. They really need to fix that. The rest of the tent works very well and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: This tent is fantastic. Far better than the Hydroponics brand tent I ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fantastic. Far better than the Hydroponics brand tent I bought subsequently. After four months of use, this tent had absolutely no damage or light perforation, including the zipper area. The other tent I bought has a good number of tiny holes and the covering behind the zipper is cheap and ended up catching and tearing on the zipper, allowing more light perforation. This is also an excellent size and has very accommodating ports, windows, and vents. Great for everyone, but beginners especially.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent. Perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. Perfect for anyone. The price is spot on and the quality is awesome. THIS IS NOT A GORILLA TENT. It isn't a big heavy tent and it was easy to assembly. The instructions were clear and precise. Took me maybe 15 min to assembly. There are plenty of vents and access is unbelievable. DO NOT USE ANYTHING HIGHER THAN A 600 WATT BULB. YOU WILL COOK YOUR PLANT. I'm ordering 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Put plants in a week ago
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent...will use as a starter tent for seedlings and beginning of Veg. stage...before putting them in a larger tent for finishing. This addition to the grow op will speed up the production line. Thanks Apollo..well done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diver99

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. No light leaks and extra flaps on the port holes really trap the light!! Nice heavy duty zippers and stitching. Easy to assemble. Only needed help because I'm not very tall!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: it was lightproof. even with two layers it wasn't water proof tho so you'll need trays.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Eulenstein

customer_reviews.title: Could be much better.
customer_reviews.text: Not very thick,no Oxford cotton, easy to poke holes in,and light leaks in all the seams. But it works good with duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Quality tent, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a flowering tent, so the fact that light leaks are easily controlled is definitely a plus. Overall, the quality is good and the price is decent. Definitely worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, unlike other tents. Materials are thick, seems they will last some time. Numerous ports for venting, intake. Sturdy Metal Frame.
customer_reviews.author: Brasco4Life

customer_reviews.title: good tent
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this grow tent for four years now , other than the velcro wearing out (lots of use) it is in good shape
customer_reviews.author: ivonne johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Best In Tents
customer_reviews.text: Apollo tents are great. Consistent quality. I own several. Can't beat the prices here on Amazon. They almost make me blush when I see what tents cost in stores. No comparison. Fine build/set-up design. Solid Easy. Perfect for the home grower.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and well made
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty, easy to set up and well made. No Light leaks as a few have stated and plenty of support for hanging lights. Looking forward to many Years of use.
customer_reviews.author: GAU

customer_reviews.title: good tent lots of ports but i think i like ...
customer_reviews.text: good tent lots of ports but i think i like my iPower better if you don't need all the ports.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent tent, zippers a little catchy but not too disappointed, zipped myself inside setting it up (small corner of room) all in all its working out well and securely holds my 40lb??? hood. two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: T.Morr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This tent came exactly as advertised. It's a good, sturdy design and is made from high quality materials. I will definately be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesnbrenda

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: One major flaw, About 8" of the zipper binding is not sewn to the tent on the bottom left side. It will be easier to sew and repair it than return the item. Pin holes in the zippers, which can't be helped. However there several more small holes in the fabric. Quality control seems to be weak, but product will still work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: This grow tent is fantastic, no light leaks anywhere and very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This grow tent is fantastic, no light leaks anywhere and very well constructed. easy to assemble just perfect for my needs. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stoukides

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent, way beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tent, way beyond my expectations. Steel frame and many access points for entry or exhaust. Wow amazing, don't try to build a box with tin foils and would this sets up nicely anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was up to expectations and would highly recommend. Very sturdy and easy set-up. Very comparable to other similar models in the 200-300$ range.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Grow Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent . I have three good sized plants in it and it is doing its job well .
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent and everything about
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent and everything about. Good quality too, i now have two of them the same size. Wish they had a roll up window like vivosun's has but still a great tent.
customer_reviews.author: woodguy84

customer_reviews.title: Was hard for me to understand how to put together at first
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with a rip at first but the customer service helped me out great! This grow tent is awesome and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grow tent for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great grow tent for the cost. Minimal light leaks at zippers. A bit of loose thread where sewed. Still very sturdy and thick lining. Overall worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: No off-gassing, no light leaks
customer_reviews.text: No light leaks, perfect size for stealth growing, but MOST importantly... NO off-gassing, just your normal vinyl smell for a couple if days. Zippers are VERY sturdy, just a great all-round product. Will buy again for sure, and recommend to all my buds. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Hempy Grow

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, on time in perfect shape, the zippers were the only issue and after trying many times I realized if u pull strait out while zipping it goes good!!
customer_reviews.author: Bussy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tent.
customer_reviews.text: This tent works very well for a mother plant to grab clones from. It is made well and has held up for the entirety of its use.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Beier

customer_reviews.title: Seems very durable and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Badass product. Seems very durable and very easy to set up. It took like 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grow tent
customer_reviews.text: Works great for indoor gardening. No issues of any kind. Easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: great starter tent
customer_reviews.text: Great size and great design a better than my 4x4 tent. Fabric freys at the zipper and gets caught. Good deal for the price. Nice stater tent. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sara Slape

customer_reviews.title: Great value....
customer_reviews.text: so far the tent has shown me no bad points only good success
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the correct product is sent
customer_reviews.text: The tent is too small for the framework. A 20" tent will not fit over a 36" frame.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sliwinski

customer_reviews.title: awesome teby
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. Has some pin hole leaks on stitching but a little tape will solve that issue. For what I paid I'm stoked!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chase bell

customer_reviews.title: Great garden tent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Great seals. Zipper quality is superior. Inside reflection seems superior to other tents.
customer_reviews.author: Nachogir1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No light leaks wonderful construction can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable snd easy to set up. I think it took about 5 minutes. It is built very well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Packer

customer_reviews.title: She seems to like like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Got this for someone else. She seems to like like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This tent is good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This tent is good bang for the buck. Zippers were a little sticky when I first set it up. After 2 months the zippers were smooth. 3' width is tight if you are using a ventilated mh light. I bought one and liked it so much I bought a second one. Fits my space perfect. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: 91Vette

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars but it has to many holes.for ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material however I need to take a star for crappy zippers that stick & bad stitching leading to light bleed.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ruger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what we were looking for ,size ,sturdiness ,do well ,thank you

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tent, not as sturdy as the 4x4. I guess size does make a difference

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really awesome grow tent. My first one. Sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: NRD

customer_reviews.title: well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and easy to use, came on time and very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to set up by one person
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to set up by one person, works great - wish it was taller but that's not enough to remove one star.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Tent comes with instructions that are easy to follow. Setup took 10-15 min. Great construction. Only thing I would change would be add 1 more cross bar that goes on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is great. Its not a Gorilla, but that's not the point.
customer_reviews.author: Pariah

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THEN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was certain I would be happy for the price. Just received it today and the quality is GREAT. It took me about 15 mins alone with no real troubles. Zippers are great and seemed to be very sturdy. (I'm assuming they listened to all the reviews and upgraded the zippers) BUY THIS 3x3x6 Apollo Tent 10stars
customer_reviews.author: alyssa aponte

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for the cost I didn't get some cheaply made junky tent, but it's made very nice. Obviously it's not as heavy and one that costs triple the money, but, it does what it's meant to do. I stood inside with the lights on outside and only found 2 tiny pin holes of light where the duct ports are sewed in, and a spot of light where the zippers go together which is expected. The corners are made of metal and not plastic and it was easy to assemble without having to use the instructions. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Horton

customer_reviews.title: its almost not usable
customer_reviews.text: the zipper on the bottom goes to three panels while the top part of the zipper goes to one panel.its
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. There are light leaks around the zippers and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. There are light leaks around the zippers and vent covers but thats to be expected with these sort of tents. It goes together quick and easy, much easier with someone helping you. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality for price paid, would buy again i needed. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stephens

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPERS CAUTION. ..
customer_reviews.text: In the long run their going to give out. I open with caution, thinking every time is going to be the last.....so far so good. .its only been a month!!!
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: anything is possible
customer_reviews.text: its awesome I love it absolutely amazing. having the ability to actually grow anything I possibly want is just wonderful. once I get to a bigger place I will definitely be getting a bigger tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kane Killian

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. The zipper so far is good. Basic with all the necessities. I would recommend. Shipping was fast too.

customer_reviews.title: easily supports my lighting fixture and exhaust
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well built. easily supports my lighting fixture and exhaust.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Metal corners instead of plastic ones was HUGE selling point for me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tent easy to put together very good zipper works great.

customer_reviews.title: hang easily and hard to pull
customer_reviews.text: zippers are difficult to use, hang easily and hard to pull.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what is described. Fast shipping. Went together perfect and does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fiscus

customer_reviews.title: However I think it is made with love.. Great tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think it's made in china.. However I think it is made with love.. Great tent for the price. 7/10 quality . 10/10 worth the buy if your looking for a 3x3 tent.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Torres

customer_reviews.title: great tent makes it easy
customer_reviews.text: Great tent all around, some pieces were a little tough to slide together. It feels solid now that it is assembled. Easy, fast temperature control with so many vents and windows.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nuber

customer_reviews.title: Good tent.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. Would reccomend. Took about 5 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good tent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Gorilla Lite Line tent previously and thought for my second tent I would try a less expensive brand. I have been pleased with the Apollo tent. . . it has convenient features such as the whole side opening combined with the viewing opening. . . easy to set up. . .adequate thickness and quality of materials. . .yes there are light leaks through pin holes but overall I would purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Street

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market you won't find another one better. Very sturdy and doesn't have light leaks. They also have great customer service. Love it
customer_reviews.author: dewayne Williams

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: tent is overall good construction. durable material. some light leaks through zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very poor instructions for putting the tent together
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions for putting the tent together. My tent came with a handful of spots of mold/mildew damage on the outside of the fabric. This may be because I ordered a less-popular 3x3x6 tent. The damage appears superficial. There are minor flaws in the craftsmanship that create small light-leaks. (Openings the size of maybe two or three needle-widths near the stitching around a zipper, for instance.)
customer_reviews.author: Alice Amanda Hen

customer_reviews.title: Pinholes of light leaking out and in. But for ...
customer_reviews.text: Pinholes of light leaking out and in. But for the price... it is what it isn't. Will ultimately just be a drying tent, but it'll work for now.
customer_reviews.author: DUJUAN HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid tent wish it could be a little more affordable though
customer_reviews.author: Time will tell

customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble with the zippers until I figured them out, but for the price I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: blake land

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for. High quality material and zippers. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David Mahrt

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% light proof without tapping seams and stuff, but zippers are! Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby David

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, seams are tough, lots of vent options. Reflective interior evenly distributes light. My plants have gone crazy with growth since I started using these tents.
customer_reviews.author: Uh How How How

customer_reviews.title: Its a great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great tent. I have seen alot of people say it's not discreet and I have no clue what they are talking about, the only thing on it says tent, not grow tent or anything like that so if your worried about discretion it definitely is pretty discreet. The huge complaint I have is that the set up instructions suck. They are so small and so hard to tell where anything goes is hard. But quality is definitely there. It would get a 5 star if not for that
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!  Solid tent with all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.text: I downsized from a an 8x4 to this 3x3. I have a 1200 watt LED light in it and two plants. probably massive over kill on the light, but hey, that'ts what I had! Plenty of space for a tower fan, plenty of openings for fresh air, and ll with a sturdy, fresh look! I went through a few used tents from CL and finally just bit the bullet and got this one new. No regrets! 3x3 is compact, go 4x4 if you want to grow a few monsters. Great quality, good price, all the features you need in a tent. holds light and zips up easy.
customer_reviews.author: B. sindelar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tent would buy another one. Very solid and well built
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: The poles I thought were going to be pretty flimsy, but they were very solid and expect ...
customer_reviews.text: The material was far more durable than I was expecting. The poles I thought were going to be pretty flimsy, but they were very solid and expect them to last a long while. There's a couple pin hole light leaks, but who cares. Everything about this screams quality to me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Knight

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent. The zipper is very solid and sewn on well. there is zero light leakage from anywhere other than where I have ports or panels open for ventilation. Great size for growing 4. I am so impressed with the build quality I have already purchased another Apollo tent.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R.

customer_reviews.title: Great size.
customer_reviews.text: Great size..came on time..I finally set it up.easy to do goes up quick..had little problem with the zipper in one the top corner but note nought to send back..Apollo is good stuff I use their lights also..
customer_reviews.author: Salogsdon502

customer_reviews.title: but other than that it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got this tent yesterday, had it up and running in about 15 mins. My only complaint would be the straps that hold down the floor mat needs to have velcro, but other than that it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wolford

customer_reviews.title: One Star

product_meta.title: Apollo Horticulture 36”x36”x72” Mylar Hydroponic Grow Tent for Indoor Plant Growing
product_meta.description:
Size:1-Pack

 The goal of Apollo Horticulture is simply to be the best value in grow lights. We continually work to produce the highest quality, fully featured, and most up to date hydroponic equipment at the lowest prices possible. We believe that yielding better quality, larger grows does not necessarily mean a higher price tag. The consistency our team delivers year after year, along with unbeatable service, makes up the complete package our customers deserve. It is our commitment to be your guiding light in the world of indoor growing, and to be the grow light company that you will want to do business with again and again.

Welcome to the next generation of grow tents – your new place to cultivate. By choosing Apollo Horticulture, we are pleased to offer you: 
- Durability: Metal frame poles keep your tent secure, and the tent’s thick fabric and quality double stitching prevent any unwanted outside exposure. 
- Protection: Heavy-duty metal zippers protect your home, safeguard your grows, yet offer you easy accessibility to your indoor grown plants. 
- Efficiency: Each tent is lined with 100% light-proof and tear-proof reflective Mylar film, which returns up to 92-97% of your grow light bulbs’ light back to your plants and herbs. Increase your grows without adding to your energy bill! 
- 90-day Warranty: Apollo Horticulture is dedicated to providing quality products backed by unbeatable service in order to give our customers the complete package that they deserve. 

Disclaimer: Apollo Horticulture products are for professional use and are to be used in a green house environment with proper ventilation only. Use of our products in any other environment such as apartments, community housing, or small enclosed spaces is not recommended and may create a potential fire hazard. By purchasing our products, you agree to the recommended use and release all liability of Apollo Horticulture and respective agents for any misuse of the products.
feature_bullets: Package Includes: 1 -36”x 36x 72” Apollo Horticulture Grow Tent / 1 – Removable Mylar Floor Tray, 2 Filter Straps Included, 1 – Instructional Pamphlet / Size – 36”x 36x 72” 100% Reflective Tear Proof Mylar / Heavy Duty Zippers & Double Stitching for Light Protection

HIGH QUALITY: 36”x 36x 72” hydroponics indoor growing tent with heavy-duty zippers and double stitching for light protection ensure durability and long-lasting use. Thick tent material reinforced by the metal poles ensures security and stability. Keep your grows contained, prevent odors from leaking out, and stop pests from getting in.

HIGHLY REFLECTIVE: Includes a removable Mylar floor tray, and a 100% light-proof, tear-proof reflective Mylar lining to assist your indoor growing light fixtures and equipment. Increase the intensity of your grow lights and retain heat to keep your grow room at the right temperature for your plants, herbs, flowers, fruits, and vegetables to thrive.

EASY ASSEMBLY: Includes an instructional pamphlet for easy set up. This is a great hydroponics growing light kit system starter, whether you want to set up your indoor garden in an apartment, condominium, greenhouse, or any rented space.

TOP CUSTOMER CARE: Your Apollo Horticulture Grow Tent for Indoor Plant Growing is backed by our exceptional customer service team and comes standard with the Apollo Horticulture Brand Guarantee and a 90-day warranty. It is our commitment to be your guiding light in the world of indoor growing, and to be the grow light company that you will want to do business with again and again. If our product does not meet or exceed your expectations, we offer a 30-day money back guarantee hassle free.
